article_text:
“Arise and take our stand for freedom as in the olden time.” Winston Churchill

“Proclaim Liberty throughout All the land unto All the Inhabitants Thereof.” Inscription on the Liberty Bell

og.description: The video below shows 10 minutes of a 28 year old Bibi Netanyahu (identified as Ben Nitay for some reason) appearing on the old PBS show “The Advocates” commenting on the Israeli-Palest…
og.title: Bibi at 28
